post:
Are you looking for a solid host? Look no further. Come home to UnderHost, and stop travelling from host to host.

Since 2007 UnderHost, has been providing quality hosting based on a simple success formula, customer service, server uptime and integrity.

VPS Package List
USA: http://underhost.com/usa-ca-vps.php
Offshore: http://underhost.com/offshore-vps.php
Windows: http://underhost.com/windows-vps.php

Admin-Level Support
We don’t give you the keys and let you crash. Our expert support is available should you encounter any problems.

High Availability
The VPS operates as part of a cluster. If a node in the cluster fails your VPS is automatically started on a standby node.

SSD San Storage
Blazingly fast SSD San Storage provides high IOPS for the best performance.

Almost Instant Setup
All new accounts are automatically provisioned and available for use minutes after orders has been accepted.

Free Migration Assistance
Changing hosting doesn’t have to be a hassle. We are more than happy to assist in moving your data from your old web host.
